statements: SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT name, height, weight FROM patients WHERE height > 160 AND weight < 70
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '%120%'
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, blood_pressure FROM patients WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT patient_id, name, gender, height, weight FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 40 AND 50 ORDER BY weight DESC, height ASC;
SELECT name, age, height, weight FROM patients WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '%120%' OR blood_pressure LIKE '%130%';
SELECT patient_id, name, gender, blood_pressure FROM patients WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY gender, blood_pressure ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, dob FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT name FROM patients WHERE dob='1990-05-15';
SELECT patient_id, name, dob, gender FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT * FROM biometric_data WHERE height > 160 AND weight < 70;
SELECT * FROM patients JOIN biometric_data ON patients.patient_id = biometric_data.patient_id;
SELECT name, dob, gender, height, weight FROM patients JOIN biometric_data ON patients.patient_id = biometric_data.patient_id ORDER BY name ASC, dob DESC;
SELECT name, gender, heart_rate FROM patients JOIN biometric_data ON patients.patient_id = biometric_data.patient_id WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT name, gender, weight, blood_pressure FROM patients JOIN biometric_data ON patients.patient_id = biometric_data.patient_id WHERE weight BETWEEN 50 AND 70 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT MAX(height) AS max_height, MIN(weight) AS min_weight FROM biometric_data;
SELECT * FROM patient_data ORDER BY age DESC, weight ASC
SELECT patient_id, height, weight FROM patient_data WHERE heart_rate > 80
SELECT patient_id, blood_pressure FROM patient_data WHERE age >= 50 AND weight < 70
SELECT patient_id, risk_category, risk_level FROM health_risk WHERE risk_level > 2
SELECT patient_id, date, height, weight FROM biometric_history ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY height DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, age, blood_pressure FROM patient_data WHERE weight < 60;
SELECT risk_id, patient_id, risk_category FROM health_risk WHERE risk_level >= 2 ORDER BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, date, height, weight FROM biometric_history WHERE patient_id = 1002;
SELECT patient_id, age, heart_rate FROM patient_data WHERE blood_pressure = 'High';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, patient_blood_type FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM BiometricData WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_age DESC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, BiometricData.heart_rate, BiometricData.blood_pressure FROM Patients JOIN BiometricData ON Patients.patient_id = BiometricData.patient_id WHERE BiometricData.heart_rate > 80;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, PatientHistory.event_date, PatientHistory.condition_description FROM Patients JOIN PatientHistory ON Patients.patient_id = PatientHistory.patient_id WHERE PatientHistory.event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, HealthRisks.risk_description, HealthRisks.risk_level FROM Patients JOIN HealthRisks ON Patients.patient_id = HealthRisks.patient_id WHERE HealthRisks.risk_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, dob FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT * FROM biometric_data WHERE height > 170;
SELECT * FROM health_risks WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT patients.first_name, patients.last_name, biometric_data.height, biometric_data.weight FROM patients JOIN biometric_data ON patients.patient_id = biometric_data.patient_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, risk_factor, risk_level FROM patients JOIN health_risks ON patients.patient_id = health_risks.patient_id WHERE risk_level='High';
